1 rem c64 basic aoc 2020

10 dim a(200)
20 for i = 1 to 200
30 read x
40 a(i) = x
50 next i
55 print "done reading data statements. Searching..."

60 for j = 1 to 200
65 print ".";

70 for k = 1 to 200
75 if k 

80 if a(j) + a(k) = 2020 then print a(j),a(k)

90 next k
100 next j

1000 data 1918,1869,1821,1852,1981,1987
